edu.thu.keg.mdap.dataset

Interface GeographicalDataSet


  • public interface GeographicalDataSet
    A dataset implementing this interface contains latitude and longitude field, and can be drawn on a map. Records are geographical points, regions, etc.
    Author:
    Yuanchao Ma

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataField getLatitudeField() 
      DataField getLongtitudeField() 
      boolean isOrdered()
      Whether points of the dataset is ordered

        Returns:

      • getLongtitudeField

        DataField getLongtitudeField()
        Returns:
        Reference of the longitude field in the database

      • isOrdered

        boolean isOrdered()
        Whether points of the dataset is ordered
        Returns:
        True if ordered. False otherwise
